content:
Craft an item of type: crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "farmland", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 17, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 36, "index": 27}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft crimson_hyphae, I need to place 4 crimson_stems in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one from slot 25 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 17, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 3, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 36, "index": 27}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: I have already placed one crimson_stem in the crafting grid, so I will now place another one next to it in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 17, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 36, "index": 27}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed two crimson_stems in the crafting grid, so I will now place another one below them in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 17, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 36, "index": 27}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed three crimson_stems in the crafting grid, so I will now place the last one next to the bottom ones in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 17, "index": 23}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 36, "index": 27}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}]
thought: I have crafted the crimson_hyphae, so I will now move it from the crafting grid to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
